abstract: Sen Cory A Booker of New Jersey comes forth as staunch defender of Sen Robert Menendez, who stands accused of bribery charges; Booker, who relied on Menendez for guidance since becoming senator in 2013, has cast himself as uncorrupted outsider but now finds himself defending maligned member of Democratic establishment.
lead_paragraph: Cory Booker, who has leaned on a fellow New Jersey Democrat, Robert Menendez, since joining the Senate in 2013, is now standing by him as he faces bribery charges.

headline.main: Booker, Mentored by Menendez, Assumes Role as His Defender During Legal Fight
headline.print_headline: Booker, Mentored by Menendez, Assumes Role as His Defender During Legal Fight

snippet: Cory Booker, who has leaned on a fellow New Jersey Democrat, Robert Menendez, since joining the Senate in 2013, is now standing by him as he faces bribery charges.
